channel.title: Tracy Chapman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tracy Chapman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Music Promoters Saw No Profit in Women-Only Concert Tours. Sarah McLachlan’s Lilith Fair Tested Their Theory: TIFF
item.description: ‘Lilith Fair: Building a Mystery’ director Ally Pankiw breaks down how a radical 1990s festival tour where top-flight female artists first performed back-to-back defied a male-dominated industry.
